attributes.additional_details: The UK has suffered over 120 thousand deaths our economy has declined. Enjoying societies luxuries comes with society responsibilities. People want to feel as safe as they can when they go out and not be wondering who (other than medical exemptions)  has not been vaccinated. Societal cohesion comes with Societal responsibilities, each individual doing all they can to protect society and not claiming liberties that could potentially damage of cause the death of others in society.
attributes.background: We request the government to ensure that vaccine passports / certification is implemented for all UK citizens. The more people that are vaccinated the less chance there is of further variants developing, which would inevitably cause irreparable damage to the economy and of our precious NHS.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575297
